title: Angry Birds with Matter.js
description: An attempt to implement the basic mechanics of Angry Birds in JavaScript using p5.js and the matter.js physics engine.

timestamps.title: Getting started with an Object Oriented Approach
Adding and using the physics engine
Adding mouse constraints to control the bird
Launching the bird with the slingshot!
Fixing bugs and things to refactor later!
Wrapping things up and improvements to make!

codeExamples.title: Angry Birds with Matter.js!
codeExamples.description: Implementation of the basic mechanics of the Angry Birds game.
